org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.behaviours

Class CurrencySplittingStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.behaviours.CurrencySplittingStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VSplitStrategy

    public class CurrencySplittingStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements VSplitStrategy
    the VSplitStrategy of a Currency entity - measures vertically divided by the original currency

      • getCurrencyCode

        public static java.lang.String getCurrencyCode(AmpCurrency usedCurrency,
                                               Cell cell)
        Parameters:
        usedCurrency - the used currency
        cell - cell
        Returns:
        the currency code. For cells with informative amount it would be the original currency

      • getCurrencyValue

        public static java.lang.String getCurrencyValue(AmpCurrency usedCurrency,
                                                Cell cell)
        Parameters:
        usedCurrency - the used currency
        cell - cell
        Returns:
        the currency value. For cells with non-informative amount it would be the used currency. The prefix is added to make the currency be the last in the list during the normal sorting.

      • getInstance

        public static VSplitStrategy getInstance(AmpCurrency usedCurrency)
        Builds a splitting strategy which splits by original currency. The current used currency should be at the end of the list, those a prefix should be added.
        Parameters:
        usedCurrency -
        Returns:

      • getEmptyTotalSubcolumnName

        public ComparableValue<java.lang.String> getEmptyTotalSubcolumnName()
        Description copied from interface: VSplitStrategy
        AMP-27773 returns the category name of the Total Empty subcolumn. If returns null, no Total Empty subcolumn exists. By default there is no subtotal empty column, thus the default implementation of this function returns null It is used for example for currency splitting, when it is needed to put empty total column in order to avoid hiding measures columns without data
        Specified by:
        getEmptyTotalSubcolumnName in interface VSplitStrategy
        Returns:
